directions: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic and onion in the oil until translucent, about 5 minutes. Stir in the spinach, garbanzo beans, cumin, and salt. Use your stirring spoon to lightly mash the beans as the mixture cooks. Allow to cook until thoroughly heated.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained well
title: Espinacas con Garbanzos (Spinach with Garbanzo Beans)
